definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: From the frigid to tropical have distribution.
sentences.chinese: 從寒帶到熱帶都有分佈。

sentences.english: China stretches across vast area covering the cold, temperate and tropical zones.
sentences.chinese: 中國幅員遼闊，包括了寒帶，溫帶和熱帶。

sentences.english: In the frigid zone, not only in winter, even if the north and south poles can also distinguish the four seasons.
sentences.chinese: 在寒帶，並非只有冬季，即使南北兩極亦能分出四季。

sentences.english: Some parts of south China are located in tropical and subtropical zones while the northern part is near the frigid zone.
sentences.chinese: 南方部分地區處於熱帶和亞熱帶，北部則靠近寒帶。

sentences.english: People in cold areas live longer.
sentences.chinese: 寒帶地區的人壽命較長。

sentences.english: We don't have them here, I'm afraid. Ginkgo trees grow well only in cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 我們這裏恐怕沒有，銀杏樹只有在寒帶才長得好。

sentences.english: Her motherland is in the tropical region.
sentences.chinese: 她的祖國位於寒帶地區。

definition: Andes mountain chain of South America
lit. to directly attack Huanglong/fig. to directly combat the root of a problem

pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

definition: (bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
to miss/to yearn day and night
